divs: sighting detailsi observed from my back porch 2 very bright stars in the sky that didn't look like the other stars at 6:37 am. on october 8, 2010 in mckinney, texas. the 2 star like objects were set up at one being at 12 o'clock and the other at lets say the center of a clock. as i am looking at them the object at 12 oclock moved very fluidly as if on a clock to the 1,3, and then stopping at the 6 oclock position. as soon as the object stopped the center object got brighter and ascended up and backwards at what i can only describe as an unbelievable rate of speed and was gone in the blink of an eye. the object at the 6 oclock position stayed in the same position until the sun came up and i lost site of it. i was looking up at about 1\3 to 1\2 of the way up in the sky and was facing nnw. i sit on my back porch alot and i sit on a flight path to dfw airport so i see alot of planes and even helicopters on occasion but seeing what i saw that morning was the strangest thing i have ever seen in my life. what was so eery about it was the fluid clock like motion and how perfect the circular movement was. that morning was just over a year ago and its if it just happened yesterday, i believe its one of those instances that is seared in your memory and just can't be forgotten.
Summary: I observed 2 very bright stars in the sky that didn't look like the other stars at 6:37 am. Then in a perfect pattern the one on top made a clock movement from 12 to the 6 position very fluidly and then the center object shot back and upward at a fast rat
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
There were no other sightings in McKinney on or around October 8th 2010
